chunk:
W/O Cleanse

Brand: W/O

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Raw Honey*, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Meal*, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Seed Meal*, Virgin Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil*, Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) flowers*, Matricaria Recutita (Chamomile) Flowers*, Evaporated Goat Milk Powder*
Directions: Spread ½ tsp gently onto dry skin with fingertips. Dampen fingertips and massage. For extra exfoliation, massage with SPONGE. Rinse with water. Follow with TONE.
